Class BookManagementSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.managers.BookManagementSystem

  • public class BookManagementSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    BookManagementSystem - This class contains all methods to interact with the main menu.
    Version:
    February 12, 2020
    Author:
    Kevin Huang 000831719

    • Method Detail

      • bookMenu

        public static void bookMenu()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Main menu method that begins by filling an arraylist with Book objects. Interactive and links to all other methods.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When a file with the specified pathname does not exist.

      • bookCheckout

        public static void bookCheckout()
        Method for checking out a book using ISBN. If the book is unavailable or there is no such book associated with the ISBN, then an error message occurs and the user is sent back to the main menu. When a book is checked out, the availability decreases,

      • findByTitle

        public static void findByTitle()
        Finds a book by the title. Case is insensitive.

      • findByType

        public static void findByType()
        Find a book by type. The user inputs the type first then the user can further choose book attributes depending on the type of book. Uses downcasting.

      • findRandomBooks

        public static void findRandomBooks()
        Finds random books depending on the user-inputted number of books.

      • saveExit

        public static void saveExit()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Prints to a new books.txt file, using the saveBook method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When a file with the specified pathname does not exist.
